_description: How to win Heaven — two couplets

BodRawPoe32.Transcription: Love god & fle fro synneAnd so may thow heuyn wynne
BodRawPoe32.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius. 
             “The Prouerbis of Wysdom.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         90 (1893): 241-68: 241.

BLHar4486.Transcription:
Love god and flee synne& thow schall hevyn wynneThat now is
                    schall turone to wasTher is no helpe but mercy & grace
